keyword: how much calories in a chicken wing
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
meta_description: Discover how much calories in a chicken wing, with a full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat details, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Wing?
assumptions: Medium-sized, bone-in chicken wing with skin, baked (no added oil), about 90 g total weight including bone.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, skin removal, and added sauces; check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A single baked chicken wing with skin provides about 99 kcal and 8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a baked chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one medium baked wing with skin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one chicken wing?

faqs.a: Typically 0 g carbs if plain; sauces can add some.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in chicken wings?
faqs.a: Frying adds about 50 kcal per wing due to absorbed oil.

faqs.q: Are chicken wings high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 7 g total fat per wing, mostly from skin.
